name: Square Wars (TheNamesAbe)
description:
Be prepared for war! In Square Wars, you take control of a blue and red square soldier from the blue and red faction.  Your objective? Takedown the general of the green and yellow faction to win the war! This is the first-ever game I made that isn't a prototype. Before you start playing, here are the controls. Also, there is controller support. To use controller support, add the game to steam and plug in your controller. 

WASD (Left Stick) - Move Around

Space (Xbox- B Button or LT, Switch- A Button or ZL) - Jump

Mouse (Right Stick) - Control Gun

Left Click (Xbox- RT, Switch- ZR) - Shoot

F (Xbox- X Button, Switch- X Button) - Interact 

Ctrl + F - Full Screen

If you have any feedback or bugs to report please let me know. If you record your gameplay and upload it, please send me your video and I would love to see it! I don't know if I will update this game or not since this was mostly to test a lot of things. Maybe in the future, there could be a sequel?
